item.title: Ahoy:Movie-watcher's Paradise
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: In this article we’ll be writing a little script which will search the piratebay’s website for the given movie title and return the resutls.

item.title: LaTeX Personalization
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: In the last article we talked about the bare-minimum LaTeX that you need to know to get started.

item.title: Getting started with arduino microcontrollers
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: If you’ve been following my blog for some time now, you might have noticed all the articles up until now have been catering to mostly learning LaTex, so in this article let’s take a break!

item.title: Bare-minimum LaTex
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: In this article I encourage you to start off learning LaTex by covering only the very basics, the bare-minimum.

item.title: LaTex for Everyone
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: As a student, or really anyone that has to take a lot of notes and documentation on a daily basis, we come across many hurdles to cross.

item.title: First Post
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: Hi there! In this first post I welcome everyone to my blog which is planned mainly to amalgamate all the different varieties of solutions I have been discovering in my University journey as a student.
